name: Amoxicillin Tablet
usage: Take this medication by mouth with or without food as directed by your doctor, usually once daily.

serious: Severe allergic reactions (swelling of face, throat, difficulty breathing)
sideEffects.notes: If any serious reaction occurs, discontinue use and seek medical attention immediately.

name: Aspirin Tablet
usage: Take one tablet with a full glass of water. Do not crush or chew the tablet.

serious: Severe allergic reaction (hives, swelling, difficulty breathing)
sideEffects.notes: Avoid alcohol while taking this medicine to reduce the risk of stomach bleeding.

name: Ascoril LS Syrup
usage: Take the prescribed dosage with a measuring cup, preferably after meals.

sideEffects.notes: Consult a doctor if symptoms persist for more than a week.

name: Atenolol Tablet
usage: Take this medication by mouth, usually once or twice daily with a full glass of water.

sideEffects.notes: Do not stop taking this medicine suddenly without consulting your doctor.

name: Azithromycin Tablet
usage: Take this medicine as directed by your doctor, preferably one hour before or two hours after meals.

serious: Liver issues (yellowing of skin, dark urine)
sideEffects.notes: Avoid taking antacids within 2 hours of this medication.

name: Benfotiamine Tablet
usage: Take one tablet daily with food, or as directed by your healthcare provider.

serious: Severe allergic reaction (difficulty breathing, swelling of face or throat)
sideEffects.notes: Consult a doctor if symptoms of allergic reactions appear.

name: Benzodiazepines Tablet
usage: Take exactly as prescribed by your doctor. Do not increase the dose without consultation.

sideEffects.notes: Long-term use can lead to dependence; use only as prescribed.

name: Cetirizine Tablet
usage: Take once daily with or without food. Do not exceed the recommended dose.

serious: Severe allergic reaction (hives, swelling, difficulty breathing)
sideEffects.notes: Avoid alcohol while taking this medication, as it may enhance drowsiness.

name: Chlorpromazine Tablet
usage: Take this medicine exactly as prescribed by your doctor, with a full glass of water.

sideEffects.notes: May cause drowsiness; avoid driving or operating machinery until you know how it affects you.
